UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and cytolytic properties of the frog skin peptide, kassinatuerin-1 and its L- and D-lysine-substituted derivatives.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Abraham B, Galadari S, Knoop FC, Sonnevend A, Pál T

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=400 µM,Mouse fibroblasts L929:50% Cell death=48 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=12.5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KK3 9904(MIC=100µM),Enterobacter cloacae HNTCC 53001(MIC=50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=100µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8325(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis RP62A(MIC=>100µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>100µM),Streptococcus group B HNTCC 80130(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus T7/20(MIC=>100µM)
